/* kr.kosmo.jobkorea.lsm.dao.lsmBoardDao.SelectLsmStuList*/
SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS row_num ,ts.task_seq ,ts.lec_seq ,Date_Format(ts.task_tm, "%Y-%m-%d") AS task_tm ,ts.enr_user ,Date_Format(ts.enr_date, "%Y-%m-%d") AS enr_date ,tf.lgc_fil_nm ,lc.lec_nm FROM tb_task_send ts , tb_task_file tf , ( SELECT lec_nm FROM tb_lecture lec WHERE lec.lec_seq = #{lec_seq} ) lc WHERE (@rownum :=0)=0 AND ts.lec_seq = tf.lec_seq AND ts.task_seq = tf.task_seq AND ts.task_seq = #{task_seq} AND ts.lec_seq = #{lec_seq} ORDER BY enr_date DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
